name: 李穎玟
objective: The course is designed for the students with engineering background.The contents of this course include electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.
schedule:
Week 1   Introduction
Week 2-3   Electric charge, force, and field
Week 4-5   Gauss’ law
Week 5-6   Electric potential 
Week 6-8   Electric circuit 
Week 9   Midterm
Week 10-12 Magnetic force and field 
Week 12-14 Reflection and refraction         
Week 14-15 Images and optical instrument	        
Week 15-17 Interference and Diffraction
Week 18 Final
scorePolicy:
Homework (20%)  
Midterm (25%)  
Final (35%)
Others (20%) - Attendance and class performance
materials:
Textbook:
Essential University Physics/ Wolfson, Richard/ 4th Edition
